Many regard us as the unbelieving Jews regarded Paul,--as trying to press our views upon the attention of others. But can we be too 


                       -21- 

urgent in bringing the light of life before perishing men? If we have the most solemn truth ever given to the world, why should we not be in earnest? Why should we not use every endeavor to persuade men to lift the cross, to bear the reproach for Christ's sake, that they may have eternal life?
